description.value: This suite includes all of the necessary implements and apparatuses necessary to interrogate, or even torture, a number of prisoners equal to half the ship's suite capacity by size, as shown in the @JournalEntry[Mnvw9iBw8gxgfCXw]{Starship Size Suite Capacity} table. When interrogating a prisoner, the interrogator has advantage on Charisma (Intimidation) and Charisma (Persuasion) checks. If they spend at least an hour interrogating a prisoner, the prisoner has disadvantage on Charisma (Deception) checks.
